text:
Indian shares fluctuated between gains and losses after opening lower as investors take stock of a SEBI proposal to tighten norms on issuance of participatory notes.





#BQMarketsNow | Sensex, Nifty recover; Aurobindo Pharma jumps 6%.https://t.co/XauLvKSwNL pic.twitter.com/vGbExUHubp— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) May 30, 2017
title: Stocks Radar: Aurobindo Pharma, BHEL, Reliance Communications
